description: Shorts that match your pace. The Aenergy Light soft shell shorts are ideal for mountaineering, climbing and hiking on hot summer days. They are made from a particularly lightweight and yet abrasion-proof double fabric. The water-repellent treatment is PFC-free. The shorts are breathable, quick-drying and their elasticated properties allow freedom of movement. A drawstring on the elasticated waistband of the shorts ensures a perfect fit. The climbing harness-compatible pockets have zippers to make sure nothing gets lost. Small slits at the sides ensure greater comfort. The Aenergy Light SO Shorts: our lightest soft shell shorts for mountain sports enthusiasts who like to move that bit faster even on hot days.
name: Mammut Aenergy Light SO Shorts - Mens
